text:
"Disney Holiday Magic Quest"
is a unique event

displaying actions
and activities

that are not
approved for guests
during normal park operation.
All guests are required
to adhere to CDC guidelines
and remaining six feet apart
from parties residing
outside of their households.

- Hey, everyone. It's Milo.
- Hey, it's Ariel Martin.

What's up, guys?
It's Pearce Joza.

Hey, everyone.
It's Kylee Russell.

We have just entered
Disney World.

We're seeing the castle
for the first time.

This is the most craziest
experience I've ever had.

It is absolutely incredible
to be the only ones here

- in the Magic Kingdom. 
- That is wild.

- That is wild.
- Oh, my gosh.

We show up
to the Magic Kingdom

ready to have
a super fun time,

- and all of the sudden--
- Maleficent and the Evil Queen

have decided to steal
the holiday magic.

Now your holiday magic
is in our hands!

And they tell us we have to
go on this giant quest

to find the holiday magic.
What? I don't know what to do.

This is not
what I was expecting.

I know the green team
is 100% going to do the best.

It's not fun going
against your friends.

But for the sake
of holiday magic,

Ariel and Pearce,
you are going down.

Wait, this isn't about
team red and team green.
This is about all of us

bringing back
the holiday magic.

It's not only
us beating Milo and Kylee,

which is, A,
very important to me,

but, B, we don't want
the magic stolen.
( screaming )
What's up, everybody?

Currently sitting here
in the Haunted Mansion ride.

There's nobody here,
which is very weird.
It's very ominous and scary.

Pearce: Ariel and I
are about to ride

the Seven Dwarfs Mine Train
and complete our second--

- Ariel: Second quest. 
- How many times do you think--
( shrieking )

We have to beat the red team,
but more importantly,

we have to get the magic back
before the sun rises.

If we fail,
we lose the holiday magic.

All right, that's good.
Let's go.

Milo: Coming in
to this whole adventure,

me and Kylee had no idea
what was going to go down.

But it was such
an amazing night.
I love Disney World.

And to be able to run around
Disney World at night

when nobody's here,
it's so magical.

Hopefully
I get to do it again.

I don't know
if I will be able to,

which is why I'm cherishing
this night forever.

Thank you so much for
hanging out with out today.

Check out the
"Disney Holiday Magic Quest."

On Disney Channel
and Disney Now.
Mwah! Peace.
